description: Chika is the childhood friend of Ryouta and in their romantic relationship with each other, she often takes the lead role. She has a crush on him and despite her best attempts, she is unable to get Ryouta to notice. She is fond of her childhood memories that she shares with Ryouta and in the end, she up take his hand. She is very level-headed and has a unyielding spirit, unafraid to play pranks on Ryouta, no matter what position they leave him in, and physically abusing Ryouta should he "deserve" it. Her number on the class list is 10.
name: Koizumi Chika
